## MentionExtension class

The mention extension manages suggestions through onChange, onKeyDown, onExit and onEnter callbacks. It also allows for configuration options to be passed into transforming suggestion queries into a mention node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MentionExtension extends MarkExtension<MentionExtensionOptions> 
```
